name: Blood Orange Negroni from Bottega
description:
This Negroni variation from Chef Frank Stitt appears on the menu at Bottega only in deep winter when blood oranges are in season. "It makes us reminisce about aperitif time in
the gorgeous cafes and bars of Torino and Venice," says Stitt. Serve with a slice of orange and a bowl of green olives.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce freshly squeezed blood orange juice

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice, add gin, Campari, vermouth, and blood orange juice. Stir well and strain into ice-filled rocks glass.
